text: Michael Jones (April 7, 1951 â€“ February 28, 2024), better known by his ring name Virgil, was an American professional wrestler and actor. He was known for his eight-year career in the World Wrestling Federation (WWF) and World Championship Wrestling (WCW). He was born in Nashville, Tennessee. In May 2022, Virgil was diagnosed with stage-2 colon cancer. He died on February 28, 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Actors from Nashville, Tennessee Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Virgil (wrestler)
